page.title: 01D BLOCK GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: {Our D block includes the villages of {South Petherton, Lopen, Over {Stratton, Seavington St Michael, and {part of Shepton Beauchamp. The area {is fairly flat with more hills {towards the south. Most of the land {is used for agriculture, and the {soil around South Petherton is {supposed to be the most productive {in the County. Farming is mainly {concerned with dairy cattle, but {there are also many orchards in the {block. {South Petherton is the largest of {the villages, and has a reasonable {number of shops and services which {are used by the surrounding {population. {The A303 trunk road bisects the {block taking traffic from the east, to {and through the West Country.
